Desi Neighborhood Opportunity Index (DNOI) — Richmond, VA
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Interactive R Shiny app to map and score neighborhoods in Richmond based on accessibility to South Asian/Muslim community resources — halal restaurants, desi shopping, cultural events, transit, and affordability.

- - - - - - - - - - - -
Key Features & Impact
- - - - - - - - - - - -
Neighborhood scoring & heatmaps: Evaluates areas based on transit access, affordability, and business density.

Interactive map: Filter by cuisine/business type, toggle neighborhood boundaries, and view DNOI scores.

Marker clustering & dynamic visualization: Makes large datasets easy to explore.

Data-driven insights: Supports community planning and business decisions.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -
Skills & Technologies
- - - - - - - - - - - - -
Languages: R, SQL

Packages: Shiny, Leaflet, dplyr, sf, osmdata, tidycensus, shinyWidgets, htmltools

Data Handling: ETL, Census API, OpenStreetMap data, processed large datasets

Visualization & UI: Shiny dashboards, interactive maps, heatmaps

- - - - - - - - - - - - -
Project Structure
- - - - - - - - - - - - -
app/ — Shiny app code

etl/ — Data extraction & cleaning scripts

data/ — Raw & processed datasets (excluded for privacy)

docs/ — Notes & documentation
